title: Ticket #4286: CondorView client tarball not packaging problem
description:
Upon installing the HtcondorViewClient, web browsers may report the java error 

   ClassNotFoundException: condor.condorview.TimeGraph.class

Looks like when the 2.0 tarball was created, we missed the step of unpacking the jarfile so both the class files and jarfile appear in the final release. See this email list discussion.
remarks:
2014-Mar-28 13:02:58 by tannenba:
Just repackaged the tarball in place, expanding the jar file.

2014-Mar-28 13:04:03 by tannenba:
I don't think we need a version history item, as this is a contrib, and also anybody who encountered the problem already fixed it. This is just to prevent headache/surprises for anyone who downloads it in the future.
check_ins: 2015-Apr-06 11:45   Check-in [44531]: edit 8.2.8 edits of doc #4286 (By Karen Miller )
creator: tannenba
